body:
This PR represents a preliminary smoke test for the `strumpack` package and is intended to serve the following purposes:

1. leverage the current E4S test suite for the software; and
2. demonstrate to package maintainers how to start a Spack smoke test.

@pghysels these are the changes I mentioned in the meeting today.
title: STRUMPACK: Add e4s testsuite-inspired smoke test
